name: unanticipated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not having been expected to happen: This was yet another unanticipated event that upset the administration's plans and expectations. It is also not the case that these sorts of issues were unanticipated.
More examplesFewer examplesThe cuts will be partially offset by an unanticipated $750,000 in extra tuition revenue generated by an increase in fall enrollment.The theater has been hit with a sudden and unanticipated loss in ticket revenue from the decrease in tourism.The hike in gas prices was caused by an unanticipated - and unprecedented - surge in demand.
